description.english: Dash right before a shot hits you and escape
description.german: Lauf, bevor ein Schuss dich trifft und Flüchte
description.french: Echappe à un coup avec la rune d'Elan
description.italian: Scatta prima di essere colpito
description.spanish: Haz un ímpetu justo antes de ser atingido y escapa ileso
description.russian: Сделайте рывок вправо и увернитесь от попадания
description.brazilian: Arranque logo antes de um tiro acertá-lo e escape ileso

description.english: Play the entire game without buying upgrades or items and using only the Crossbuster (Knight/Epic)
description.german: Spielen Sie das gesamte Spiel ohne Geld auszugeben und benütze nur Crossbuster (Ritter/Epik)
description.french: Termine le jeu sans acheter d'amélorations ou d'objets et en utilisant la Crosbuster (Chevalie/Epic)
description.italian: Gioca il gioco senza comprare potenziamenti o oggetti e usando solo la Crossbuster (Cavaliere/Epica)
description.spanish: Juega todo juego sin comprar actualización o elementos y utilizando la Crossbuster (Caballero/Épico)
description.russian: Играть всю игру, не покупая обновления или предметы и использовать только Crossbuster (Рыцарь/Эпос)
description.brazilian: Jogue o jogo sem comprar aprimoramentos ou items e usando apenas a Crossbuster (Cavaleiro/Epic)

displayName.english: You're not the boss of me now!
displayName.french: Tu n'es plus mon patron maintenant !
displayName.italian: Tu non sei il mio capo ora!
displayName.brazilian: Você não é o meu chefão!

description.english: Defeat one boss with his own weapon
description.german: Besiegt ein boss mit seiner eigenen Waffe
description.french: Bats un boss avec sa propre arme
description.italian: Sconfiggi un boss con la sua stessa arma
description.spanish: Derrota a un jefe con su propia arma
description.russian: Победите любого босса его же оружием
description.brazilian: Derrote um chefão com sua própria arma

displayName.english: What do we say to the God of death?
displayName.german: Was sagen wir dem Gott des Todes?
displayName.french: Que disons-nous au Dieu de la mort?
displayName.italian: Cosa diciamo al Dio della morte?
displayName.spanish: ¿Qué le decimos al dios de la muerte?
displayName.brazilian: O que você diz para o deus da morte?

description.english: Defeat a boss with only 1 HP left
description.german: Besiegt einen Boss mit nur 1 TP übrig
description.french: Bats un boss avec seulement 1 HP restant
description.italian: Sconfiggi un boss con un solo HP
description.spanish: Derrota a un jefe con sólo 1 punto de salud restante
description.russian: Победите любого босса с 1 единицей здоровья
description.brazilian: Derrote um chefão com apenas 1 ponto de vida restante

description.english: Beat all stages of the game in less than 2 hours
description.german: Schlagen Sie alle Stage des Spiels in weniger als 2 Stunden
description.french: Achève tous les niveaux du jeu en moins de 2 heures chrono
description.italian: Supera ogni livello in meno di 2 ore
description.spanish: Bate todas las etapas del juego en menos de 2 horas
description.russian: Пройдите игру меньше чем за 2 часа
description.brazilian: Termine todas as fases do jogo em menos de 2 horas
